rows.label: qev090403_MSG0001
rows.name:
I only came out here to search for muneria flowers so
I could use them to make a medical device, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0002
rows.name:
Very very impressive bit of tech, that, don't you think?
It can fix pretty much any Ma-non injury by rebuilding
the tissue cell-by-cell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0003
rows.name:
The only problem is that the components are are very
hard to find, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0004
rows.name:
And I suppose it kind of defeats the point if you get
hurt looking for them, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0005
rows.name:
But I heard that many muneria flowers were seen
growing around a place called Rustpool Banks, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0006
rows.name: So head out there and grab some, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0007
rows.name: Er, any luck? Did you find the muneria flowers?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0008_2
rows.name: These should fix my legs up. Er, I hope?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thank you so so much. I'll never forget this, okay?
And I promise to pay you back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hmph. You can pay us back by slamming shut
that gob of yours and getting out of here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0012
rows.name:
BLADEs await us farther in,
and we've wasted more than enough time here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0013
rows.name:
I'm rebuilding the muscle tissue now with that
homemade medical device, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0014
rows.name: Shouldn't be long until I'm back on on my feet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090403_MSG0015
rows.name:
As soon as I'm better, I can repay you properly,
all right?[ST:wait ]
